Name: Avalon City
Details: The planetary capital of Canopus IV, Avalon City is lesser known due to the political and military importance of Crimson, where the seat of Canopian goverment is located. Instead it specializes in being the cultural and leisure center of the world, and known by the nickname of 'Paradise City' to distinguish it from the capital city of the Federated Suns, which is also named Avalon City.
